content: As of September 30, 2022, total mobile subscribers amounted approximately 20 million, increasing almost 500,000 total clients when compared to the same period of 2021. We have increased our total convergent unique customers to 2.2 million, increasing almost 60,000 clients when compared to the third quarter of 2022, while currently 52% of our broadband customers have a mobile bundle. During the nine months of 2022, Flowâs unique customers reaching 1.3 million, increasing in almost 200,000 total clients or 18.3% when compared to the same period in 2021. During the nine-month period of 2022, consolidated revenues grew by 44% on nominal terms, reaching P$370 million. When analyzing set figure adjusted by inflation, revenues amounted to almost P$471 billion, showing a decrease of 12% in year on terms versus the same period in 2021. Slide 16 shows a summary of the companyâs CapEx in PP&E and intangible assets during the nine-month period of 2022, which amounted to almost P$75 billion or an equivalent of $508 million at the official FX rate.
